episode.title: Franklin v. Gwinnett County Public Schools

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice William H. Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 90-918, Franklin versus Gwinnett County Public Schools will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: For the reasons stated in an opinion on file with the Clerk, the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings, and this opinion is not unanimous.
Justice Scalia has filed a concurring opinion and is joined by the Chief Justice and Justice Thomas.
